item.title: [PI] Wilderness Warning
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

[size=10pt]Thanks for moving.[/size]

Not sure if this was released, i looked around. Made this very quickly, incredibly easy to do…
Anyways…

Client.java Server-Sided

Add this method

public void wildyWarning() { getPA().sendFrame126("WARNING!", 6940); clearQuestInterface(); //Edit the below if you want to change the text, and delete the slashes. //getPA().sendFrame126("Proceed with caution. If you go much further north you will enter the\nwilderness. This is a very dangerous area where other players can attack you!", 6939); //getPA().sendFrame126("The further north you go the more dangerous it becomes, but there is more\ntreasure to be found.", 6941); //getPA().sendFrame126("In the wilderness an indicator at the bottom-right of the screen\nwill show the current level of danger.", 6942); getPA().showInterface(1908); }

Under public void process()

if (inWild() == true && WildernessWarning == false) { resetWalkingQueue(); wildyWarning(); WildernessWarning = true; }

Add this

public boolean WildernessWarning = false;

Result

xml4w7.png761×500

Credits to owner of SpadeScape for the idea

Read full topic
